 88: 


 89:     # # quasi-random sequence is correlated -> rejection method can not work!


 90:     # # Polar Box-Muller


 91:     # cdef int i


 92:     # cdef double p, q, radius


 93:     # for i in xrange(3):


 94:     #     gsl_qrng_get(r, tmp)


 95: 


 96:     #     p = tmp[i * 2] * 2 - 1


 97:     #     q = tmp[i * 2 + 1] * 2 - 1


 98:     #     radius = p ** 2 + q ** 2


 99:     #     while (radius == 0 or radius >= 1.0):


 100:     #         gsl_qrng_get(r, tmp)


 101: 


 102:     #         p = tmp[i * 2] * 2 - 1


 103:     #         q = tmp[i * 2 + 1] * 2 - 1


 104:     #         radius = p ** 2 + q ** 2


 105: 


 106:     #     s[i * 2] = p * sqrt(-2.0 * log(radius) / radius)


 107:     #     s[i * 2 + 1] = q * sqrt(-2.0 * log(radius) / radius)


 108: 


 109:     return s


  __Pyx_XDECREF(__pyx_r);
  __Pyx_INCREF(__pyx_v_s);
  __pyx_r = __pyx_v_s;
  goto __pyx_L0;

 110: 


 111: 


 112: 


 113: 


 114: '''


 115: class RandomBase


 116: {


 117: public:


 118:     RandomBase(std::string distribution): distribution(distribution) { };


 119:     virtual ~RandomBase() { };


 120: 


 121:     std::vector<double> get_random_numbers()


 122:     {


 123:         if (distribution=="uniform")


 124:             return get_uniform();


 125:         else if (distribution=="gaussian")


 126:             return get_gaussian();


 127:         else


 128:             return std::vector<double>(6, 0);


 129:     }


 130: 


 131:     std::string distribution;


 132: 


 133: private:


 134:     virtual std::vector<double> get_uniform() = 0;


 135:     virtual std::vector<double> get_gaussian() = 0;


 136: };


 137: 


 138: 


 139: class Random_gsl_rng : public RandomBase


 140: {


 141: public:


 142:     Random_gsl_rng(std::string distribution): RandomBase(distribution)


 143:     {


 144:         gsl_rng_env_setup();


 145:         T = gsl_rng_default;


 146:         r = gsl_rng_alloc(T);


 147:     }


 148:     virtual ~Random_gsl_rng() { gsl_rng_free(r); }


 149: 


 150: private:


 151:     const gsl_rng_type* T;


 152:     gsl_rng* r;


 153: 


 154:     std::vector<double> get_uniform()


 155:     {


 156:         size_t n_dims = 6;


 157:         std::vector<double> s(n_dims);


 158:         double tmp[n_dims];


 159: 


 160:         for (size_t i=0; i<n_dims; i++)


 161:             s[i] = gsl_rng_uniform(r) - 0.5;


 162: 


 163:         return s;


 164:     }


 165: 


 166:     std::vector<double> get_gaussian()


 167:     {


 168:         size_t n_dims = 6;


 169:         std::vector<double> s(n_dims);


 170:         double tmp[n_dims];


 171: 


 172:         for (size_t i=0; i<n_dims; i++)


 173:             s[i] = gsl_ran_gaussian(r, 1.0);


 174: 


 175:         return s;


 176:     }


 177: };


 178: 


 179: 


 180: class Random_gsl_qrng : public RandomBase


 181: {


 182: public:


 183:     Random_gsl_qrng(std::string distribution): RandomBase(distribution)


 184:     {


 185:         T = gsl_qrng_halton;


 186:         r = gsl_qrng_alloc(T, 6);


 187:         gsl_qrng_init(r);


 188:     }


 189:     ~Random_gsl_qrng() { gsl_qrng_free(r); }


 190: 


 191: private:


 192:     const gsl_qrng_type* T;


 193:     gsl_qrng* r;


 194: 


 195:     std::vector<double> get_uniform()


 196:     {


 197:         size_t n_dims = 6;


 198:         std::vector<double> s(n_dims);


 199:         double tmp[n_dims];


 200: 


 201:         gsl_qrng_get(r, tmp);


 202:         for (size_t i=0; i<n_dims; i++)


 203:             s[i] = tmp[i] - 0.5;


 204: 


 205:         return s;


 206:     }


 207: 


 208:     std::vector<double> get_gaussian()


 209:     {


 210:         size_t n_dims = 6;


 211:         std::vector<double> s(n_dims);


 212:         double tmp[n_dims];


 213: 


 214:         // Polar Box-Muller


 215:         double p, q, radius;


 216:         for (size_t i=0; i<n_dims/2; i++)


 217:         {


 218:             do


 219:             {


 220:                 gsl_qrng_get(r, tmp);


 221: 


 222:                 p = 2.0 * tmp[i * 2] - 1.0;


 223:                 q = 2.0 * tmp[i * 2 + 1] - 1.0;


 224:                 radius = p*p + q*q;


 225:             }


 226:             while (radius >= 1.0);


 227: 


 228:             s[i * 2] = p * sqrt(-2.0 * log(radius) / radius);


 229:             s[i * 2 + 1] = q * sqrt(-2.0 * log(radius) / radius);


 230:         }


 231: 


 232:         return s;


 233:     }


 234: };


 235: '''
